nodes.text: An Osteo fragmenter was an interrogation tool designed to extract information from a captive prisoner. In 34 ABY, an osteo fragmenter was one of many interogation tools stored in an alcove in the interrogation room of the First Order Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Finalizer when Kylo Ren, leader of the Knights of Ren, interrogated the Resistance pilot Poe Dameron there. Later that year during the occuaption of the planet Batuu by the First Order, an osteo fragmenter stored in a small white case was sat atop a crate in the courtyard of Savi's Workshop in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu.

An osteo fragmenter first appeared in the 2015 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The prop was then first itdentified in the 2016 sourcebook Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
